casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Agar, Appellant, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio, Appellee, et al.

[Cite as State ex rel. Agar v. Indus. Comm., 97 Ohio St.3d 191, 2002-Ohio-5781.]

(No. 2002-0211 Submitted September 17, 2002 Decided November 6, 2002.) Law Offices of Thomas Tootle Co., L.P.A., and Thomas Tootle, for appellant. Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and Lisa R. Miller, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
